text:
@narendramodi https://t.co/BZO8i9mjEn Shri Narendra Modi Ji, "India" is with you, to defeat Covid19 Pandemic,Your Wisdom always highly reliable even at crisis moment - Under your leadership, Together "India" will defeat Covid19, even before its 3rd stage of Development

Awaiting 8pm address,Ji
